article_title: Employers Levying 'Per Child' Charges To Increase Families' Share Of Health Costs

article_metadata.description: For employees who have children, companies are layering extra costs in the form of higher premiums and surcharges divvied up "per child” rather per family onto a worker’s tab for healthcare.
